title: Milano Digital Front
description: Milano Digital Front is an MVP website concept for a new hardware and interiors store. Created after learning the business had no online presence during a job interview, it showcased initiative. While they chose to outsource, the effort was acknowledged and well received.

title: Dynamic Surge Price
description: A surge pricing simulation tool that calculates real-time order costs based on live weather data. Users input their location to view base pricing, weather surcharges, and total cost. It models real-world pricing logic to enhance transparency and better user understanding of dynamic cost changes.

title: Multiplication Game
description: An engaging and interactive multiplication game designed to help users strengthen their math skills in a playful way. Featuring score-based challenges, the game encourages quick thinking and accuracy while offering a fun learning experience through a clean, responsive, and user-friendly interface.
